data.title: Kantha Rao
data.meta_description: Tadepalli Lakshmi Kantha Rao was an Indian actor and producer known for his works predominantly in Telugu cinema.
data.text:
Tadepalli Lakshmi Kantha Rao (16 November 1923 â€“ 22 March 2009) was an Indian actor and producer known for his works predominantly in Telugu cinema.[1]

Quick Facts Born, Died ...

Close

Regarded as one of the finest method actors, Rao appeared in more than 400 feature films, starring in many, in a variety of genres including mythological, social and folklore. He has also acted in a few Hindi, Kannada, Tamil, and Malayalam movies. He has produced about five films under the Hyma Films banner.[2]
